item.title: Pentagon to send 350 National Guard troops to New Orleans as violent crime surges ahead of major events
item.description: More than 300 national Guard troops will assist law enforcement in New Orleans through Mardi Gras as officials work to combat rising violent crime.

item.title: Alito rips Supreme Court majority as 'unwise' for blocking Trump's National Guard plan
item.description: Supreme Court temporarily blocks President Trump's National Guard deployment in Chicago as Justice Samuel Alito warns the decision could limit federal...

item.title: Inside the White House Christmas card tradition – from Coolidge to Trump
item.description: The history of the White House Christmas card list is long, unique, with annual messages as distinct as the former presidents themselves.

item.title: Democrats warn Trump greenlighting Nvidia AI chip sales could boost China’s military edge
item.description: Congressional Democrats oppose NVIDIA's advanced H200 chip sales to China, with lawmakers calling the decision a threat to U.S. military security.

item.title: Prominent Rhode Island Democrat caught on video telling officer, 'You know who I am?' during DUI stop
